## WishlistItemUpdateInput interface

Defines updates to items in a wish list

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WishlistItemUpdateInput 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description?](./magento-api.wishlistitemupdateinput.description.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Customer-entered comments about the item |
